name: Mouser
description:
For Games Made Quick! I remembered the gamejam about halfway through so had to rush a bit.

Many years ago, when I was learning to use Unity, I made a very fun spaceship game. Learned how to make things feel satisfying with explosions and screen shake and nice noises. Tragically, I lost the files in a bizarre Unity Hub accident and never recovered them.

So I'm REMAKING them! Now with LORE! Play as an engineered asteroid-cat and defend the belt from Earth's army with your ai copilot. You can't see the cat, but they're in the ship, I promise.
